channel.title: Question about current servers & clients
channel.description: I'm still very new to making servers I'm working on a 317 right now which isn't too complicating for what I like to do. I like to move stuff around and add new monsters and change the drops and stuff and just play with a few friends. But I see the servers and clients are getting better for graphics and gameplay. I saw this new PI stuff and it looks pretty awesome but is it hard to code or is it the same as 317? I don't do anything really with clients I haven't looked into that yet.

item.title: Question about current servers & clients
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

id be willing to help you out with the 317 client dilema i could find you a great starting server easy coding when i started out it was complicated after a while of dealing with it, it gets alot more easier to read and comprehend.

Read full topic
